page.title: 03Life Styles.
page.content: My name is Nick Doughty, I am 8 years old.A typical day for me would be to get up at 7:30am,then have brekfast at 8:00am,which would be corn flakes or weetabix and a cup of tea,then I watch television.I then collect my freinds and arrive in school at 9:00 and we play for half an hour.We come in for assembly at 9:30am and have an English lesson.Followed by play time and maths.At 12:15pm we have dinner followed by play time.After dinner we read and have a welsh lesson followed by History,Geography,craft,science History,Geography,Craft,Science,Bible or games depending on what day it is.School ends at 3:30 pm.I walk home with my freinds and go to their home to play .I go home at about 6:00pm and have tea with my family.Later I watch televsion before going to bed at 10:00pm.
